DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : To assess pharmacokinetic ( PK ) parameter teriflunomide single oral dose 14 mg administration Chinese healthy subject Secondary Objective : To assess safety tolerability single oral dose 14 mg teriflunomide Chinese healthy subject
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetic Profiles Single 14 mg Teriflunomide Tablet Healthy Chinese Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: - Screening : 2 21 day inclusion ( Day -21 Day -2 ) - Institutionalization period : 6 day include 1 treatment day ( Day -1 Day 6 , treatment Day 1 ) - Follow-up : 7-10 day ( may extend ) - End study : Day 38 Day 41 ( may extend ) - Total study duration : maximum 9 week
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female subject , 18 45 year age , inclusive . Body weight 50.0 95.0 kg , inclusive , male , 45.0 85.0 kg , inclusive , female , body mass index 19.0 24.0 kg/m2 , inclusive . Certified healthy comprehensive clinical assessment lab test . Subject must use appropriate contraception method . Having give write informed consent prior procedure relate study . Exclusion criterion : Blood donation , volume , within 3 month inclusion . Symptomatic postural hypotension , whatever decrease blood pressure , asymptomatic postural hypotension define decrease systolic blood pressure ≥20 mmHg within 3 minute change supine stand position . Excessive consumption beverage xanthine base ( > 4 cup glass per day ) . If female , pregnancy ( define positive βhCG blood test ) , breastfeed . Any medication ( include St John 's Wort traditional Chinese herb medicine ) within 14 day inclusion within 5 time elimination halflife pharmacodynamic halflife drug , exception hormonal contraception menopausal hormone replacement therapy ; vaccination within last 28 day . Any consumption citrus ( grapefruit , orange , etc ) juice within 5 day inclusion . Subject ( male female ) disagree use appropriate contraception method . The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
